A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was a fun film\, I don’t understand a lot of the negative reviews. Hamill\, Ridley\, Driver\, Tran\, and the late Carrie Fisher deliver stellar performances. While I loved John Boyega in The Force Awakens\, I feel there was something missing from him in this film. The effects of course are wonderful and The Action is great. The film does feel very odd in the beginning but it finds its stride as it moves along. But I think this is right up there with all the other Star Wars greats. But seriously am I the only one who likes it?
